entry.title: Combined summary - Receiving node on mainnet?
entry.summary: One user, Cezary Dziemian, reached out to the Lightning-dev mailing list for advice on becoming a receiving node on the mainnet. To do this, they need to convince existing nodes to "lock" funds on their side. Ad치n S치nchez de Pedro Crespo, the CTO of Stampery Inc., recommended the #mainnet channel on the LN Discord as a place for discussion among those with mainnet nodes. He also offered to play "the invoice game" back and forth if anyone shared their node_id and IP address. The Lightning Network subreddit is another great resource for testing mainnet Lightning Network nodes. The email was sent to the Lightning-dev mailing list hosted by the Linux Foundation and included no information in the HTML attachment. Interested parties can join the LN Discord through the provided link.
